general_info: We are a modern eatery focused on digitally inspired dishes.
Reservations can be made via phone (555-FOOD) or our website (mocksite.com).
Today's special is the 'Code Carbonara' for $15.

menu_items.description: Tagliatelle pasta with a vibrant, pixel-art inspired vegetable medley and a light garlic sauce.
A perfectly calculated 1/2 lb beef patty with cheddar, onions, lettuce, and our signature 'logic' sauce on a brioche bun.
Fresh mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and croutons with a structured data vinaigrette.
A slice of creamy cheesecake with a swirling raspberry reduction.
